msItem.title: Anwar-i Suhaili.
msItem.note: Incomplete at beginning, starting in the middle of the story of the owls and the crows. On watermarked European paper. Front flyleaf: a) signature of J? Luck? b) Presented by Sir John Malcolm May 19. 1827. A Persian reworking of the Kalilah wa Dimnah, itself based on a Sanskrit original.
msItem.incipit: ... mizaj darad wa ma'ayib-i bi-ghayat wa maqabih-i bi-nihayat

condition.p: Some damage caused by white ants at end.

bindingDesc.p: Brown leather European-style binding with blind-tooled decoration.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
